programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: At the YG Entertainment facility, the members celebrated their fourth anniversary as a group, preparing a special dance of the choreography of "How You Like That" dressed as characters from the movie Frozen. After a raffle, Rosé had to dress up as Princess Anna, Jisoo as Elsa, Lisa as Olaf, and Jennie as Kristoff. Then, the renowned South Korean magician Choi Hyun Woo was invited, who performed a series of magic tricks on the members.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: In Bangkok, unknown guests come and prepare special gifts for BLACKPINK while they are gone. BLACKPINK members are surprised to find out who the mysterious guests are. Then they spend their last day in Bangkok to fly to Ko Samui and enjoy water leisure sports.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: BLACKPINK members spend the day in Koh Samui playing water sports, eating great foods, and exploring the island's diverse culture. The next day, BLACKPINK goes to experience zipline per Rosé's suggestion.
